EmailTemplate.name: Executive Briefing New York.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Invitation to Chill: Executive Briefing with VMTurbo at 230 Fifth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We’re excited that you will be joining us for the Executive Briefing on Thursday, February 20th, 2014, 5:30PM at 230 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY. It‘s the perfect location for relaxation after a long work day.
In the meantime, to quench your thirst for information about how VMTurbo can optimize your virtualized environment across multiple hypervisors, and cloud platforms check out this white paper <http://bit.ly/18wIHtR>.
Cheers, VMTurbo Team
-----------------------------------------------------------------
VMTurbo Executive Briefing Thursday, February 20 5:30 PM-7:30 PM 230 Fifth - 230 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY 1001
